item.title: Learn About Different Kinds of Sensors: Position and Motion Measurement
item.description: This article will help you understand and become familiar with other sensors that play a very important part in process control, but may not be encountered on a daily basis. The following are covered in this chapter: ■ Position, distance, velocity, and acceleration sensors ■ Rotation sensors using light and Hall effect sensors ■ Force, torque, load cells, and balances ■ Smoke detectors, gas, and chemical sensors in the industry
